Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Iye adati; “Ngakhale kuti ine nditakubweretserani langizo labwino loposa limene mukuti mudapeza makolo anu ali kutsatira?” Iwo adati, “Ndithudi ife sitikhulupirira zimene iwe ukuti watumizidwa.”
Kotero Ife tidagwetsa chilango pa iwo ndipo taona mmene chinalili chimaliziro cha iwo amene adakana choonadi
Ndipo Abrahamu adawauza abambo ake pamodzi ndi anthu ake kuti, “Ndithudi ine ndili kudzipatula ku zimene inu mupembedza.”
“Kupatula yekhayo amene adandilenga ine ndipo, ndithudi, Iye adzanditsogolera.”
Ndipo adawapanga mawu kuti akhazikike mwa iwo amene adadza iye atachoka kuti akhoza kubwerera
Iyayi! Koma Ine ndidawapatsa ,iwo ndiponso makolo awo, chisangalalo mpaka pamene choonadi chidadza kwa iwo ndi Mtumwi amene anali kuwafotokozera zonse momveka
Koma pamene choonadi chidadza pa iwo, iwo adati, “Awa ndi matsenga ndipo ife sitikhulupirira mwa iwo.”
Ndipo iwo amati: “Bwanji Korani iyi siidatumizidwe kwa munthu wina wotchuka wochokera ku Mzinda wina pakati pa Mizinda iwiri?”

Kodi ndiwo amene akhoza kugawa gawo lina la chisomo cha Ambuye wako? Ndife amene timagawa pakati pawo chakudya chawo cha moyo uno ndipo tawakweza ena kukhala apamwamba kuposa anzawo kotero kuti akhoza kulemba ntchito anzawo. Koma chisoni cha Ambuye wako ndi chabwino kwambiri kuposa chuma chimene amasonkhanitsa

Ndipo zikadakhala kuti anthu onse anali a chipembedzo chimodzi, ndithudi, Ife tikadawapatsa onse amene sakhulupirira mwa Mulungu madenga a siliva kuti aike pa nyumba zawo ndi pa makwerero oti azikwererapo
Ndipo nyumba, zitseko ndi mipando, zonse zikadakhala za siliva kuti azikhalapo

Ndipo zipangizo zina zikadakhala za golide. Komabe zonsezi sizikadakhala chinthu china koma chisangalalo cha m’moyo uno. Ndipo moyo umene uli nkudza, umene uli ndi Ambuye wako, ndi wa anthu ochita ntchito zabwino
Aliyense amene asiya kukumbukira Mwini chisoni chosatha, Ife timamusankhira iye Satana kuti akhale bwenzi lake la pamtima
Ndipo, ndithudi, iwo amangowasokoneza ku njira yoyenera koma iwo amaganiza kuti ali kutsogozedwa bwino

Mpaka pamene wotereyu abwerera kwa Ife, iye amati, pomuuza bwenzi lake la pamtima, “Kukadakhala kuti pakati pa ine ndi iwe panali mtunda wotalika monga kutalikirana kwa kum’mawa kuwiri!” Bwenzi loipa lenileni
Ndipo popeza inu munali kuchita zoipa, lero sizidzakuthandizani popeza nonse ndinu olandira chilango
Kodi iwe ungawapange agonthi kumva kapena kutsogolera anthu akhungu kapena kutsogolera iye amene ndi ochimwa
Ndipo Ife tikakutenga, Ife, ndithudi, tidzagwetsa chilango chathu pa iwo
Kapena ngati Ife titakuonetsa zina zimene tawalonjeza iwo, ndipo ndithudi, Ife tili ndi mphamvu pa zinthu zonse
Kotero gwiritsa chimene chavumbulutsidwa kwa iwe. Ndithudi iwe uli pa njira yoyenera
Ndipo ndithudi Ichi ndi chikumbutso kwa iwe ndi kwa anthu ako ndipo posachedwapa mudzafunsidwa
Ndipo afunse iwo za Atumwi athu amene Ife tidawatuma iwe usanabadwe. Kodi Ife tidasankha milungu ina yoti izipembedzedwa yoonjezera pa Mwini Chisoni Chosatha
Ndipo, ndithudi, Ife tidamutumiza Mose ndi uthenga wathu kwa Farawo ndi mafumu ake ndipo iye adati, “Ndithudi ine ndine Mtumwi wa Ambuye wa zolengedwa zonse.”
Koma pamene iye adadza kwa iwo ndi zizindikiro zathu zooneka, iwo adaziseka zizindikirozo
Tidawaonetsa zizindikiro zosiyanasiyana, chilichonse chopambana chinzake, ndipo Ife tidawapatsa chilango kuti akhoza kutembenuka
Ndipo iwo adati, “oh iwe munthu wamatsenga! Mupemphe Ambuye wako m’malo mwathu, molingana ndi lonjezo limene Iye adapanga ndi iwe. Ndithudi ife tidzatsatira njira yoyenera.”
Koma pamene tidawachotsera chilango, iwo adaphwanya lonjezo lawo
Ndipo Farawo adalengeza pamaso pa anthu ake kuti, “Oh inu anthu anga! Kodi Ufumu wa dziko la Aiguputo si wanga? Nanga mitsinje imene ilikuyenda pansi pa mapazi anga, kodi simuli kuiona?”
“Kodi ine sindine wopambana kwambiri kuposa munthu wonyozeka amene ali kukanika kuyankhula momveka?”
“Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani iye sadavekedwe zigwinjiri za golide kapena bwanji silinadze ndi iye gulu la angelo lomuperekeza?”
Motero iye adawapusitsa anthu ake ndipo iwo amamumvera iye. Ndithudi iwo adali anthu onyoza
Ndipo pamene iwo adatikwiyitsa, Ife tidawagwetsera chilango ndipo onse tidawamiza m’madzi
Ndipo tidawapanga iwo kukhala phunziro kwa mibadwo yam’tsogolo
